snippet.title: Thalamus Collection 1 - Evercade Cartridge Tour
snippet.description:
Captured directly from the Evercade VS.
While the three C64 collections usually have a mix of games from different publishers, usually from Epyx and Hewson Consultants (plus their Rack-It label), this cart is focused entirely on a specific publisher. This collection contains many C64 games from Thalamus, one of which is an updated remaster.

Games in this cart:
00:00:00 - Intro
00:00:23 - Armalyte: Competition Edition
00:02:54 - Creatures
00:12:03 - Creatures II: Torture Trouble
00:19:04 - Hawkeye
00:23:06 - Heatseeker
00:27:09 - Hunter's Moon Remastered
00:36:40 - Nobby the Aardvark
00:43:31 - Retrograde
00:52:45 - Snare
00:56:50 - Summer Camp
01:02:29 - Winter Camp

Armalyte, Creatures I & II, Hawkeye, Heatseeker, Hunter's Moon, Nobby the Aardvark, Retrograde, Snare, Summer Camp, Winter Camp, Maximus Mouse (C) Thalamus Digital Publishing
